name: Mer Brulée
description:
In this run 'n gun like, play two true sea PATRIOTS stucked in enemy territory !

We were 4 to develop the game :

BOMBAIL Hugo : Code
GARCIA Axel : Code
RODRIGUEZ "Leba" Hugo : Art
CLAISSE Jean : Musics/Sounds

Pro tip : Please don't give up before 10000 score ;)

Made in 72h with Unity3D
